logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4091559) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4091559) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

All events of Bells palsy with no events in prior clean period (183 days). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 1 day. Includes both UMN and LMN palsy.

cohortName: FDA AESI Bells palsy events for incidence characterization
logicDescription: All events of Bells palsy. No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 183 days. Includes both UMN and LMN palsy.
